decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana through cards like Arboreal Grazer and Explore to eventually play powerful combo pieces like Primeval Titan and Scapeshift. Utilizing lands like Bojuka Bog and Vesuva, the deck aims to assemble the Amulet Titan combo to generate massive amounts of mana and overwhelm the opponent with powerful land-based threats. By using cards like Urza's Saga and Lotus Field, the deck aims to create explosive plays and quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to respond.

The deck focuses on combining aggressive creatures with disruptive effects to control the battlefield and pressure the opponent. By utilizing cards like Flickerwisp, Ephemerate, and Recruiter of the Guard, the deck can repeatedly disrupt the opponent's game plan while developing its own threats. Cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push help to clear the way for the deck's aggressive creatures like Emperor of Bones and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. Overall, the deck aims to keep the opponent on their back foot while steadily chipping away at their life total to secure a victory.

This control deck aims to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan by countering key spells, removing threats, and generating card advantage. It utilizes a mix of counter spells, removal spells, and planeswalkers to control the board while also including powerful threats like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to close out the game quickly. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and includes fetch lands for deck thinning and Boseiju, Who Endures for uncounterable spells. The deck focuses on managing the game state and winning through incremental advantages.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on a combination of board control and card advantage to outlast and outmaneuver opponents. By using a mix of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, the deck aims to control the game until it can establish a dominant position. The inclusion of versatile spells like Prismatic Ending and Tune the Narrative allows for flexibility in dealing with a variety of threats, while cards like Oracle of Tragedy and Thundertrap Trainer provide additional card advantage to stay ahead in the game.

This deck focuses on using the interaction between Basking Broodscale, Glaring Fleshraker, and Writhing Chrysalis to generate a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Blade of the Bloodchief and Kozilek's Command, the deck can quickly boost its creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With access to powerful lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Eldrazi Temple, this deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and efficiently, ultimately leading to a dominant position in the game. Additionally, the deck includes a variety of control elements like Malevolent Rumble and Walking Ballista to deal with opposing threats.

This deck focuses on using ramp cards to quickly bring out powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the game with counterspells and removal spells. The goal is to reach the late game where the Eldrazi creatures can dominate the battlefield. Karn, the Great Creator provides additional utility with artifact tutoring and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon helps to clear the board and protect your creatures. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents by efficiently managing resources and using powerful threats to secure victory.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards like Beyeen Veil, Goblin Charbelcher, and Lotus Bloom while utilizing disruptive spells like Spell Snare and Disrupting Shoal to protect the combo. It also includes cards like Fallaji Archaeologist and Tameshi, Reality Architect for additional combo pieces and card advantage. The deck aims to win the game without relying on traditional lands, instead utilizing a mix of artifacts and creatures to generate mana and control the board.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and using burn spells to quickly defeat the opponent. With strong creatures like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, combined with burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment, the deck aims to apply early pressure and close out the game swiftly. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and utility to the deck. Overall, the strategy revolves around achieving a fast and relentless offense to overwhelm the opponent.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing a mix of creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, alongside powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provides additional sources of recurring damage. The deck also incorporates disruption with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells. It aims to quickly strip the opponent's hand of key cards using cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also utilizing removal spells like Fatal Push to clear the way for its creatures. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Emperor of Bones to apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Graveyard Trespasser helps to disrupt graveyard-based strategies. The lands in the deck provide utility and mana fixing to ensure consistent gameplay.
